column4: Hey guys I am having a problem connecting to ssh on my system from my blackberry using bbssh- I get the error "authentication failed" available methods are public key, gssapi-with-mic,password   any ideas anybody?
the default is password authentication. Are you using key authentication in SSH (if you don't know then you aren't using it)
make the folder, then run: sudo useradd username -p password -d /var/www/username -s /bin/false; sudo passwd username
you can then run:  sudo chown -R username:username /var/www/username
